mapper.insert: INSERT INTO problem (id, creator, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime});
mapper.update:
UPDATE problem
update_time=#{updateTime},
description = #{description,typeHandler=com.oneq.programmingpracticeplatform.typehandler.problemhandler.ProblemDescriptionTypeHandler},
tags = #{tags,typeHandler=com.oneq.programmingpracticeplatform.typehandler.StringToJsonTypeHandler},
solution = #{solution,typeHandler=com.oneq.programmingpracticeplatform.typehandler.problemhandler.ProblemSolutionTypeHandler},
judge_config = #{judgeConfig,typeHandler=com.oneq.programmingpracticeplatform.typehandler.problemhandler.JudgeConfigTypeHandler},
visible=#{visible,typeHandler=com.oneq.programmingpracticeplatform.typehandler.enumhandler.ProblemVisibleHandler},
judge_inputs = #{judgeInputs,typeHandler=com.oneq.programmingpracticeplatform.typehandler.IntegerToJsonTypeHandler},
judge_outputs = #{judgeOutputs,typeHandler=com.oneq.programmingpracticeplatform.typehandler.IntegerToJsonTypeHandler},
WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, tags, solution, judge_config, visible, judge_inputs, judge_outputs FROM problem WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT judge_outputs,judge_config FROM problem as p,submission as s WHERE s.id = #{id} and p.id=s.problem_id
